## The Rain in Spain!
```{r}
rainicon <- makeIcon(iconUrl = "https://openclipart.org/image/800px/178744", iconWidth = 45*215/230, iconHeight = 45,
  iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16)
```

